name: Mallow Wood Doorframe: "Gentle Melody"
description: A fence gate made of sturdy Mallow Wood, on which ornate patterns are carved. According to the artisans of Petrichor, where these gates are found, the asymmetrical structures result in a warm, light feeling, and the curves bestow the frame with a gentle and melodious beauty. However, the complicated design makes it difficult to adapt to standard doors, so it is limited in terms of practicality and suitable installation locations...
